GMCM.ToggleHotkey.Desc: This is the toggle hotkey for Auto-WateringCan.
GMCM.AutoSwitch.Desc:
Automatically switches to the WateringCan when near crops; the WateringCan must be in the toolbar.
To make planting easier, this feature will be disabled when you are holding seeds.
GMCM.DetectCrops.Desc: Only targets hoe dirt with crops.
GMCM.DetectPetBowl.Desc: Your pet needs water! Please don't forget!
GMCM.Auto-WaterFilling.Desc: When the watering can's water is below the maximum value, it will automatically fill when near a water source.
GMCM.RetainStamina.Desc: When the remaining Stamina reaches this percentage, Auto-WateringCan will stop.
GMCM.StaminaNotification.Desc: Display a notification when Stamina is low.
Notification.LowStamina: Auto-WateringCan has temporarily stopped due to low Stamina.
GMCM.CustomRange.Desc: Customize the watering can’s range. If unchecked, the range will default to the tool’s upgrade level.
GMCM.CustomEfficiency.Desc: Customize efficiency settings. If unchecked, it will default to the tool’s upgrade level.
GMCM.Efficiency.Desc: Number of crops watered per use.
